deals.title: Pure Green Smoothie
deals.itemDescription:
Kale, spinach, mango, pineapple, banana and coconut water.

The Pure Green Smoothie is formulated with an abundant amount of kale and spinach which are rich in chlorophyll, vitamins and minerals. These vitamin rich vegetables are blended with the mango, banana and pineapple so the fiber is retained. The base of coconut water has a low sugar content and all of the ingredients paired together offers a taste that is off the charts.

deals.title: Pure Green Acai Bowl
deals.itemDescription:
Base: acai, spirulina, banana, almond milk

Toppings: blueberries, sliced banana, hemp granola.

The Pure Green Acai Bowl is a blend of organic acai sourced from the amazon rainforest and blended with spirulina to give it a dark green color and a touch of banana for a creamy consistency. This bowl is topped with sliced bananas, blueberries and organic hemp granola.

deals.title: Pure Gingerade - Cold Pressed Juice
deals.itemDescription:
Ginger, lemon, cayenne and agave.

The Pure Gingerade cold pressed juice was designed to taste like a ginger lemonade. The cold pressed ginger in this formula has been known to aid in digestion and the cayenne pepper as been known to help with blood circulation.

We are a proud supporter of local and organic farms.

deals.title: Pure Greens Apple, Lemon and Ginger - Cold Pressed Juice
deals.itemDescription:
Apple, lemon, ginger, kale, spinach, cucumber, celery, zucchini and romaine.

The Pure Greens with Apple, Lemon, Ginger a.k.a ALG is one of Pure Green’s most popular cold pressed juices. The base formula is an energizing kale, spinach, cucumber, celery zucchini, romaine combined with apple, lemon and ginger. The apple gives this green cold pressed juice a sweet taste while the lemon and ginger provide the a balance flavor.

We are a proud supporter of local and organic farms.
